channel.title: video on Pippin Barr
channel.description: Recent content in video on Pippin Barr

item.title: Let's Play Permadeath Speedrun
item.description: A permadeath speedrun is a playing of a game in which you try to die as quickly as possible. Season 1 (2014) Featuring: VVVVVV, SUPERHOT, Super Hexagon, Jostle Parent, Hotline Miami, Helix, Desert Golf, GIRP, Sausage!! Sausage!! Sausage!!, Pitfall!, ADVENT, The Graveyard, Kaizo Mario, Super Punch-Out!, The Oregon Trail, Half-Life, Papers, Please, Season 2 (2019) Featuring: F-Zero, Mappy, The Legend of Zelda, Baba Is You, VVVVVV, Shit Snake, Minit, Super Mario Bros.

item.title: Shooting
item.description: Shooting is a planned video series in which I playing videogames that include gun violence and shoot the same dead person (or creature) over and over again until I run out of ammunition. Shooting, season 1 Featuring: Half-Life
